title: Startup Founders Podcast Episode 11 – ScriptRock co-founders Mike Baukes and Alan Sharp-Paul
content: This week, I interview the co-founders of ScriptRock, Mike Baukes and Alan Sharp-Paul. In addition to having sweet Australian accents,  they have some interesting stuff to say about enterprise IT, moving to the US, and building a startup team. Remember to send questions, comments or feedback to me @markjsaldana. Listen now: iTunes Stitcher RSS Feed Thanks for listening. Tune in next week for another episode!
